name: Typing Clicker Experiment
description:
Type the words as they appear in the left side (Capitals and symbols are important) while clicking buttons on the right side!

The only prompt for this project was "experimental" and after staring at my computer for what felt hours, I realised I was constantly staring at my word document as well as Discord. I was already thinking about "How about I game-ify a real life normal activity?" and that is how this game was born. Quite easily my favourite game that I made as a solo project.
